Feature: Custom home and lock screen wallpaper

Android: No,[99] but available using the vendor's companion/PC suite application such as Samsung Smart Switch & HTC Sense[100]

iOS: Yes, using external computer or iCloud[102]

Android: 4+ also available on earlier versions with customized firmware, such as Cyanogen Mod and on older Samsung Galaxy smartphones[110]

Feature: Text/document support (read only; creating using third party apps)
iOS: Microsoft Office,[117][118][119] iWork, PDF, Images, TXT/RTF, VCF
Tizen: Read only: text files, PDF, HTML, Multiple office formats

iOS: No, 3rd party software on jailbroken devices[123]
